name: A Debate of Minds
description: A philosophical debate between Albert Einstein and Steve Jobs on the nature of innovation and intuition.

scoring_parameters.eloquence: How well-articulated and persuasive the arguments are.
scoring_parameters.originality: How novel and insightful the ideas presented are.
scoring_parameters.relevance: How well the arguments stick to the topic of innovation and intuition.
scoring_parameters.logic: The strength and coherence of the reasoning.

parameters.topic: The role of intuition versus rigorous analysis in driving true innovation.
